cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portd to 99999 (exceeding valid port range) will cause invalid F1 interface configuration and connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting ra_ResponseWindow to 999 (invalid value) will cause invalid RACH response window configuration and random access procedure failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ra_ResponseWindow 設定為 999（無效值）會導致無效的 RACH 回應窗口配置和隨機接入程序失敗。
